name: VR Battle Grid
description: Ready to sink the fleet? Step right into VR Battle Grid where you are the naval commander and the rockets are ready to launch! It's you against the machine. Do you have what it takes to win?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: i5 6500K Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 Storage: 128 MB available space Additional Notes: Any VR ready PC which run most HTC Vive apps well should work just fine.
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i7 6700K Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 980 Storage: 256 MB available space

reviews.review_text: love it! if you grew up playing battleship then this is a nice visual representation of it. a bit minimalist but well done.
